First to Flipkart delivery service - Thanks a lot, I received it earlier than promised. I also received a chocolate from you guys, it felt really nice. Multiplied my joys of receiving my new phone.

Now to the iPhone.

Packaging - As always - neat & superior!

The phone - It feels great. I personally chose the iPhone 7 over 7+ because of the size. Moving from iPhone 5 to 7 was absolutely no downer in terms of size, the size suited me well. Specifications wise - still exploring. ;)

What's evidently different - the home button (the number 3 pressure press feels quite weird. Chose number 1 option) and yes of course the no-audio jack. So you do receive wired earphones better known as lightning compatible earphones. The end of your wired earphones connect to the slot of the lightning connector.

Review Title: Apple countinues to outperform with its new masterpiece
Review Paragraph:
I'm using iPhone from 3GS generation. I have upgraded my iPhones every year since then. People might say its costly, but to be honest it justifies each & every single penny spent on it. It's a craftsmen masterpiece. Though it does not gives alot of features which other flagship phones do in this segment in the market, but honestly think do we really use those features in real time usage. iPhone makes your regular task so easy & simple which is their primary focus (Make user experience as simple & useful as possible). Its so fluid & fast compared to any flagship phones available in the market. Their software & hardware works seamlessly that it make the users experience alot easier & faster. Its single core scores outperforms the latest flagship of Google, samsung & one plus.

If you thinking for an upgrade from 5s/6 or 6S then its worth doing mainly for the below reasons -

1) Camera lovers would love the new 12 mp camera with ƒ/1.8 aperture on the iPhone which supports low light photography & optical image stabilization (included now in iPhone 7 too). The front facing camera is now 7 mp HD camera . It has a Quad-LED true tone flash.The pictures are so realistic & clear. The best in the market right now.
2) iPhone is now finally IP67 certified - dust and water resistant
3) Memory - Now available in 32/128/256 GB for the same price as previously for 6s 16/64/128GB respectively.
4) New A10 fusion chip is extremely fast & the graphics output is incredible like a game console.
5) Battery has been increased from 1715 mAh to 1960 mAh giving you about 2 hrs more battery life than 6s. My phone last 1 entire day with heavy usage.
6) iPhone 7 now has Quad-core processor with 2GB of RAM & iPhone 7plus with 3GB of RAM.
7) Stereo speakers are really amazing with good sound quality output.

The introduction of new colours to the iPhone rage has given one more reason to buy. My personal favourite is the matte black one (though the Jet black looks more appealing than the matte black one) , but the matte black is less prone to scratches & figure prints than the Jet Black.

I pre-ordered my iPhone 7 first time on any online site but & I must say Flipkart made it a real amazing one. The delivered me my Phone the very next day of its release in India when people where standing in line outside the store to get one.
They made it special by giving the customer a cadbury & shooting the customers expressions while unboxing their iPhones.
Thank You flipkart for this gesture. You made me feel a special customer. Looking forward to buy more electronic genuine products from you.

Review Title: A Cute Little Stealthy Black Beast
Review Paragraph:
Firstly the Flipkart service is awesome. IP7 was launched on 7th Oct 7 PM and I got it by 8PM same day. A pat on their back for the excellent service. Packaging was also very very secure. A premium black box had the phone box inside it. A nice touch to the user experience all together.

About the phone. If you already have IP6S, you should not upgrade or can go for a 32gb model.
But if you have IP6 or below, upgrading to IP7 will be good decision. My brother have IP6 and when I put both these phones side by side, IP7 nails it everywhere.

IP7 - The Good.
Camera - This is undoubtedly the best camera you have on any IP and just next to Samsung S7
Display - Even if it is not quad HD or something, when you put other IPs in the side, the diff will be very obvious. A very pleasant display. A warm touch to the display feels pretty nice to look at. And also the quad HD screens have their bads.
Speakers - not Stereo but way too loud
Finger print - Now with this one, press and lift your finger as fast you can and the phone will be unlocked. We tested it on IP6, IP6S and IP7 and you can guess the winner.
Lift to Wake feature is welcoming and very useful.
Its water resistant also. I put my 70K phone in a mug of water with heavy heart (as apple does not include water damage in warranty) but nothing happened.
Finally the Black color is stealthy and awesome.
Performance - It will beat any phone by huge margins. A cute little stealthy black beast.

IP7 - The Bads.
Battery - It's not bad, I will say but it would have been a bit bigger. Best thing is if you are not using your phone, battery will not drain.
Fast Charging - This is needed in any phone today
Headphone Jack - USB Jack is pretty awesome, but the downside is that if you are low on battery and it's charging, you can't put headphones for music or calls. You have to wait for sometime. Or may be buy a bluetooth headphone.

Overall a good package and atleast for someone like me who were a loyal Android user from past 6 years, switching to Iphone (IOS) is an awesome experience. I just love everything about this phone.

I am happy with the Purchase and with Flipkart Service.

Review Title: Amazing is the one word for Apple.
Review Paragraph:

Here was my New I phone 7, mesmerizing look, feature touch , crisp and clear display, sound at its best, even the ear-pods are too classy and give a good sound. Camera is above par no other phones comes close to pic quality than I phone 7 .Finally I must say if you have not used I phone , Use it for once you will surely not regret. Thanks.!!

It would be presumptuous to not acknowledge that all those who pre-ordered this device, myself included, have done it simply for the allure of the latest iPhone. Even as I say this, I wasnt entirely convinced of the iPhone 7 when I watched the livestream of the Apple Keynote. However, a timely launch in India, less exorbitant pricing and a hefty cashback was what finally swung me in favour of it.

While Apple might have not made much headway in design for 3 generations now, I take some solace in the fact that I got the Black variant which sets it apart from the earlier generations. Having said that, the accumulation of the incremental updates is what makes this a significant step up from the 6s - IP67 protection, cleaning up of antenna lines, camera with better low light performance and OIS, stereo speakers, brighter screen with wider colour gamut, 40% faster quad core CPU, hexa core GPU and the bigger 1960 mAh battery. However, the focus will be more on what has been lost, namely, the headphone jack and the physical Home button. Coming from Android phones with capacitive only buttons, the latter doesn't matter at all, especially since it is now a multi-function button that does a lot more than the physical one. However, I must admit that pressing it felt odd initially and I mistook the vibration as flexing of the case in which my phone was encased. The loss of the former however will not be an easy one. It may have been a courageous move but also a bit impractical. I use a Sony SBH54 Bluetooth headset and the audio quality is still some way off to justify using it all the time. It is even more antagonizing when you have invested a significant amount in purchasing high-end 3.5mm jack headphones. At least, there is the headphone adapter which comes only in white and goes very well (not!) with the Black variant. I guess that is a compromise I have to live with and really hope that Apple has made the Lightning port a lot sturdier. I can somehow accept this decision if indeed, as Apple has stated, it was a price to pay for a larger battery, water resistance and stereo speakers without ruining the dimensions, even though I can accept an additional 2mm of thickness any day. Apart from the device itself, you buy yourself in to a large repertoire of accessories that simply dont exist for other devices.

As far as iOS is concerned, Apple has been more forthright about picking up whats good in others (as has Android) which means a more accelerated rate of iOS progression compared to an approach of deterrence through suing. Also, Apples walled garden now has a pet door with overtures to developers to utilize aspects of iOS that were previously, preciously locked away. iOS also continues to be the platform of choice for innovative app developers who are not simply targeting income through baited ad clicks. Even Google and Microsoft continue to offer an incredible experience on iOS which is inexplicably better than what they offer on their own platform. It is perhaps not contestable that iOS offers the best security, privacy, optimization and consistency of any phone, even though most of it comes from Apples control of every aspect of the device. Also, the exclusivity of the OS has some appeal to it at a time when Android can be experienced on any PC. To sum it up, you cannot go wrong with buying the iPhone, unless you had to take out a mortgage to finance one.

P.S. I received my iPhone at around 8 p.m., about an hour after the launch and really loved the custom packaging. Enjoyed purchasing something from Flipkart after a long time.

Review Title: This is 7. But doesn't live upto expectations.
Review Paragraph:
iPhone 7 - 32GB Black

Pros :
- Superfast A10 Processor
- Improved Home button (Haptic Feedback)
- Excellent Low light camera with Image stabilisation
- 32GB Storage from base models
- Improved Stereo sound from speakers
- Great battery life. Almost lasts for a day with a full charge. Significantly better than the predecessor.
- Most importantly, this time it is waterproof.

Cons :
- I had the iPhone 6S (16GB), I haven't noticed much difference and the aesthetics of the phone just feels the same. Not worth upgrading from an iPhone 6 / 6S.
- No headphone jack. Have to insert the adaptor in order to use any external headphones with 3.5mm jack.
- Screen quality is the same.

Verdict : I feel the phone was overhyped while the phone is a very good buy for new iPhone users or anyone upgrading from 5S and below.

Started with iOS and now back to it!

The iPhone 7 is a wondrous device with slick animations, gorgeous design, and compelling hardware - but it does come with its niggles - especially for people coming from Android. The first nick is the lack of convenient transitioning software (the move to iOS feature kept crashing on me for some reason) - so you have to start off by manually doing everything again - the same way you've been doing for the last 15 years or so. So say anything you want about technology but some things aren't changing here either. Now that we know that we have to feed all contacts manually to avoid complex data inconsistencies, you think of leaving that for last and install the super handy Trucaller app in the meantime - ONLY TO REALIZE MOMENTS LATER THAT TRUCALLER ON iOS DOES NOT SHOW A LIVE CALLER ID THE WAY IT DOES ON ANDROID - which essentially means you're left feeling completely embarrassed for the first few moments of any call you take if not the entirety of the call - AFTER which you can check the number MANUALLY and lament your lack of better judgment during a call.

But, a few more nicks later, you will most certainly come out overwhelmingly satisfied with your decision to switch to an iDevice! Long live Apple!

A big thumbs up to Flipkart for convening our purchases - big or small - in such little time and with so little trouble!

Review Title: FLIPKART GAVE ME FAULTY & USED iPHONE 7
Review Paragraph:
I received my new iPhone 7 today(17th-May'17) at 11:30 AM, when i tried to turn it on it wasn't turning on i tried everything possible like press & hold the power key for 2 to 5 secs, also Press and hold the Volume Down button and the Power key together for 15 to 20 seconds but noting worked out. I called the Flipkart customer service immediately and they informed me as the iPhone 7 new & might not be charged hence they suggested me to put it on charge for couple of hours & try to turn it on after that. I charged it for more than 2 hours 30 mins & tried to switch it on using the same way but it didn't, once again i called Flipkart customer server & this time they suggested me to visit the near by Authorized Apple store & get it checked. I visited Apex Apple store which is at Paradise Secunderabad near to Parklane hotel & informed them about the problem with my brand new iPhone 7, they tested it & confirmed that my brand new iPhone 7 is faulty hence suggested to inform the same to Flipkart immediately. While leaving from Apex Apple store i requested them to check for the warranty once, they removed the sim slot & entered numbers on it to the Apple website after that i was in big shock when they informed me that my new iPhone 7 is showing that its under warranty only for 307 days. They(Apex) said when the brand new iPhone 7 isn't turn on & activated yet then why its showing that warranty as 307 days & if its showing like that then it means its used one. I had to call Flipkart once again & informed them about it.

I just can't believe that such a electronic commerce company called Flipkart who is celebrating its 10th anniversary can deliver such faulty & used products to their customers. Now all i want Flipkart to do is return back the amount & my old iPhone & take away their BRAND NEW FAULTY USED iPHONE 7.

I believe if apple will get to know about this then they'll not allow Flipkart to sell their products at all.

First I'm reviewing the product:

As I was using iPhone 5 earlier this phone is much amazing. In speed and in performance both. Camera is of very good quality and images are coming more stabilized and crisp. Black color and design and curves of this phone is awesome.

Secondly let's talk about Flipkart delivery. I just want to say if end is well then all well but Flipkart should introduce more transparency in there delivery system to save customer from a nightmare like situation specifically around such big sales. My product got delayed by a week no body was able to give me clear picture that why it is delaying and when it is going to be delivered. So I'm hoping that next time Flipkart is going to manage there delivery part much efficiently.

Thanks Flipkart for such a wonderful phone. :)

Review Title: Decent phone. Recommend going for 7 plus or 8 plus
Review Paragraph:
First iPhone experience was good, courtesy Flipkart. The phone came as mentioned in the description, without any damages or tampering. I got it in exchange with my one plus one for Rs.31000 during the big billion days including emi offers etc.which was the best price one could get.
About the product,
Pros -
1. Switching from android to iPhone is easy now. Except all your whatsapp backup is in google cloud and I could not find a way to get my previous chats from google to iCloud.
2. Photos backup in my android are still in g drive, no need for them to download in iphone to take up unnecessary space.
3. Camera is amazing with inbuilt effects.
4. Sadly no portrait mode. Can download an app for that though.
5. UI is amazing, obviously considering its an apple product.
6. Multitasking and switching between apps is seamless
Cons -
1. Poor battery life. Lasts six hours with moderate use.
2. No fast charging, can use 2A iPad adapter though. Charges 0 to 100 in 2 hours. Will give 40-50% charge within half hour.
3. Small screen. 4.7 inches is small compared to 5 or 5.5 inch which provides a better experience
4. Need a protective cover so the screen doesnt break, which changes the look. I myself bought spigen
5. No headphone jack, if that matters to you.

The iPhone 7 is legitimately among the most interesting, opinionated, powerful phones Apple has ever shipped, and the most confident expressions of the companys vision in a long time. iOS 10 is excellent, the cameras are better, and the performance is phenomenal. And the batteries last longer. These are terrific phones.

Good Stuff
* Water resistance
* Improved cameras
* Better battery life
* Great display
* Taptic engine feedback is neat
Bad Stuff
* Lack of headphone jack is inconvenient
* Looks just like an iPhone 6 in a case
* Wireless audio ecosystem is immature
* #donglelife
Thanks to flipkart got the before time as promised for the best price. The phone is outstanding in performance and the camera is simply superb. Looks same as iphone6s minus headphone jack.

Pros:
Product Design (4 Stars)
Though Apple have really come back with a nice sleek design (by removing the 3.5 jack), the body in its entirety looks sturdy as well.
The stereo speakers at the bottom make a superior audio quality, though not that loud
Shifting from an iPhone 5S, the force technology comes into play and the home button built inside helps, as the same was prone to damage earlier
Clarity of pictures is enhanced, with the improved retina display

Features & Functionalities (5 Stars)
The 12 MP Camera is good and captures good picture quality even in dim light
The front facing camera (usually for FaceTime) has improved drastically
The new Home button needs to be setup properly
iOS10 deserves some nice credit to bring with it nice features like widgets (though available in other OS)

Logistics & Handling (5 Stars)
Flipkart deserves kudos as the one of the iPhone was delivered to me the next day of the launch whereas the other took a week to deliver
Packaging was good which ensured the delivery of the phone intact

Cons:
Apple needs to seriously rethink its strategy for headphones.
Moving to lightning connector should mean that the audio headphone should have the same
It is not desirable to connect via the converter always
Also these headphones should be provided as per the colour of the iPhone (suggestions to improve)

The iPhone is definitely recommended for everyone, who wants to have nothing, but the best.

I owned the iPhone 6 for almost 2 years. Fast forward to May 17,and Flipkart starts the Big Billion Sale,putting this phone at a staggering price of 38500/-It was a deal I just couldn't let go off and hence made the jump to IPhone 7.
About the device:
1) My iPhone 6 had started to feel sluggish after iOS 10 releases and the 16gb storage was a real pain. This phone is a beast,when it comes to performance,everything just feels butter smooth and swift.

2) iPhone 6 has a good display,but the one on this is class apart,at first you might think it is yellowish,but there is an entire colour palette which could not be distinguished before,now comes to notice. You have to spend some time to experience it.

3) The iPhone 7 rocks a 12 mp rear and 7 mp front camera which seems good,like it takes better photos obviously with a higher resolution but for all you folks who want a distinct camera experience go for the 7 plus. However that being said the one on this won't disappoint you in any way.

4) The home button,seems so so so better than the physical one on the 6,that I tend to check my phone more frequently than ever just to feel it. The 3D Touch I know it's there,but I forget to use it.

5) The stereo setup and the new haptic engine really make the ringtones seem way different than iPhone 6.

That's all,this might be a familiar looking design and an incremental update to the iPhone 6,without any mid blowing features,but then as the ad says it's does all the things in a better way than the previous generation. It might not have anything that really sets itself apart from the 6 line up,apart from water resistance and stereo speakers,but be rest assured it's an awesome phone and it will fly through everything you put at it.
Good phone

6. Rest same as IPhone 6

Cons

Final call- unless it's your first iPhone buy and you wanna iPhone to show off go for it otherwise either 7plus or go for android.

No matter what the people say, iPhone 7 is the best phone you can buy in the market. The 4.7 inch display is beautiful and beats most of the 1080p displays in the market. The absence of a headphone jack doesn't bother me because I am use to using bluetooth headphones and when I need to i can use the included lighting ear pods. Review Title: Worth buying at discount price offered by flipkart
Review Paragraph: Product was upto the mark. However the screen was yellowish with default settings. On exploring the said issues online, I found that these are manufacturing problems coming up in Iphone. On review of the said problem, I found that certain settings are required to be changed. On following the said steps, the yellowish screen minimized to that extent. However with Iphone being such a huge and expensive brand, as a customer default view should have been at its best. Iphone Co. Should accordingly work upon in their coming versions. Flipkart did its best and made the genuine supplier supply the genuine product. The product was worth buying at such discounted price of 39K, which otherwise is available in stores at 47-49K. Keep up the good work Flipkart !!

Review Title: Awesome mobile at a good price..!!
Review Paragraph:
The best mobile at this price range (~40k),
Excellent in performance, camera, look. Battery is good.
I have used samsung S5, S6 & S7 edge. But i hv to say it is really better than them all.
Flipkart delivery was really fast (within 2 days).

First off a big shout out to Flipkart logistics and the prompt delivery guy who made this happen despite of heavy delivery rains!
Got this delivered the next day after ordering. Impressive (applause)
About the phone:
I shifted from my OnePlus 3T, which was an equally good phone. Things that I miss:
- dash charge
- got a walnut case which is of no longer use to me
- dual SIM (using Jio data)

Certainly feels good to comeback to iOS on my phone. Apps are stable and usable again. Well almost, minus the nuances of iOS 11.
Huge pluses for me include:
- iMessage: way better than WhatsApp, Messenger
- FaceTime: my go to video call app
- Apple Music: loving it
- Bluetooth connectivity is far superior
- true colour reproduction in my images and amazing low light performance

Didnt have enough budget to go for iPhone 10. Glad that I got 7 (cue Thunderstruck by AC/DC \,,/ )

The next day (23rd) I received the device in the evening and was happy with the packaging and everything, the phone of course is really good and Im typing this review on it and to be honest, the headphone jack is not so much of a problem for me, and for the price I got this phone for (39k) I am really happy I made the right choice and right time to buy it.

Even though I didnt expect to wait an entire day and get the phone the next day, overall the ordering process was smooth and the device is worth every penny I spent. Go for it if there is a sale again and you wont be disappointed!

Review Title: Iphone 7 rocks and so does Flipkart!! Kudos.
Review Paragraph:
Ordered the phone on 09 August 2017, Ekart delivered the product on 11 August 2017.
The phone came in the standard Flipkart packing with bubble wrap inside. The phone box was sealed and in good condition. There were no sign of any wear and tear from outside.
The phone inside was intact as promised and the phone works very well.
Battey lasts for an entire day and even more smoothly with a single charge with moderate to typical usage.
The camera performance is pretty good and has been taking some very good pictures.
The speakers on the bottom are of stereo quality and provides very nice sounds.
The touch panel works very smooth and quickly.
The network availability and call quality is very good as compared to other phones.
Reliance Jio working pretty good, also you can make calls from the Jio number even when the phone is connected to an wifi network.
Facetime works very well.
Google Maps support is also available.

Thanks for reading and I hope my review helps anyone trying to buy this phone online from Flipkart.
Excellent Product

Super fast delivery by flipkart.

Review Title: Performing = Awesomeness but have some suggestions as well.
Review Paragraph:
I have been using iphone5s for the past 2 years. Switched to 7 very recently after 3 weeks of usage here are my observations:
1. No problems in User interface. No problems related to performance. It is simply amazing.
2. Iphone 5s was provided with a 2.1 Amp charger output. I am not sure why iphone 7 came with a 1Amp charger.
3. The headphone come with a lightning connector. So it means you cannot listen to songs or do a meeting using headphones while charging it. Or the other way round.

Overall Using the phone is awesome. But it would have been better if the box come with a splitter cable as well to support headphone and charger at the same time. Also the fast charging is gone as the charger is of low Ampere output

I ordered iphone7 on the first day of its electronics sale along with exchange of my old phone... somehow the delivery man found a scratch on my old phone so he refused to take it.. I was ready to pay off the exchange value...but such a ridiculous policy.. I was made to cancel the entire order... and place the same order... however I did not get the day1 deal of the sale ... and the new price was 1 k extra....so the entire process was a waste and ultimately I faced a loss of 1 thousand bucks !!

Delivery as prior d dates
... as usual , good work. N ant d fone no doubt awesome n sleek n perfect in hands

Review Title: Amazing 7 if you Don't own a 6/6S.
Review Paragraph:
Amazing product. To me the Gold looks much more amazing than Black. Though the phone is quite similar to its predecessor, the camera is better. Won't comment too much on performance as even 6 was great for me and 7 looks amazing to. Haven't utilised it in a way where I can comment on performance but it's pretty smooth to function. The new speakers and much better. If you play music simultaneously on 6S and 7, you won't even hear what's being played on 6S. The lack of 3.5mm jack is noticeable as I use Bose Earphones instead of EarPods and it's tedious to use the connecter in between plus also hampers sound quality (The Air Pods aren't available yet).
Lastly, summing it up, if you have a 6S, don't upgrade to this. It might be worth skipping this variant in between. If you have a 6 and don't like the 3D Touch, skip this model. Else just grab it whenever you can get your hands on it.

P.S. Amazing delivery from Flipkart. Had the phone with me at 7:20 PM, on October 7, when it was released at 7:00 PM. The black box package from Flipkart has already done enough no of rounds on Social Media, but sincerely felt nice.

Review Title: Experience of switching from android to iOS
Review Paragraph:
I have been an android user since long, so switching to this was big decision. But, I did it, which I feel is best due to my needs.

Would recommend this to people who don't want much of piracy (which is now possible with iOS too).

It's simply best when it comes to doings things in best possible way.

It's not for people who want to do many odds or love to change things every now and then. For them android is best, where you can install any beta app, play with themes, test things around, download movies, share them, download songs, download pirated games/apps, etc.


Best for multitasking (can switch between any number of apps)

No doubt, best camera. Have to admit that Samsung s7's camera is still better than iPhone 7. But that's a small trade off.


Conclusion, good for those who believe in simplicity.

migrated from iPhone 6. am finding a significant improvement in performance. the taptic home button is much better than expected. you get used to it very fast. battery life has significantly improved. not an avid music listener so the lack of a dedicated 3.5 mm port is not an issue for me. the minimum storage space should have been 64 GB by default though. bought this piece as exchange from flipkart. very fast and prompt response from the flipkart team. no hassles during exchange either. very impressed with flipkart . thank you

If you are die hard apple fan then iphone 7 will not disappoint you. For those who are using iPhone 6s it's better to stick to the phone for another year.

I was planning for an iphone 6s when iphone 7 is launched, hopping that 6S will get a price drop. It's just the Matte black shade which forced me to buy this device, except for that everything looks similar to iphone 6S , yes it's a more powerful hardware inside but I will hardly use this extra processing power. But Matte black shade is a killer, you will just love it.

I'm getting around 40 hours of standby battery backup with 4G turned on all the time and phone used for almost 8 hours, which is impressive for my use. Camera looks better than previous models but surely not something very impressive.

I had to restart the phone once in the last 7 days, I was not properly able to make anything work by tapping, once I restarted everything was back to normal. Not a great sign, especially for the fastest Iphone, I only got Insta and Whatsapp installed as resource consuming apps. Though it looks like a glitch nothing more. The device is not worth for 60K anyway, if you get decent cash back offer, price around 50K is more sensible.

Now coming to Flipkart service, I ordered the device on 4th Oct and promised delivery on 13th, they later updated it can be delivered only on Nov 10th. So I went ahead and cancelled the order. Later ordered it during Diwali for a next day delivery which they promptly did.

Review Title: I phone n flipkart both rock
Review Paragraph: Finally got my long awaited I phone 7. They made it more special with amazing Flipkart black box cover which has"This is .....You know what it is" written on it. The apple box was in that black box with all the required utilities.Phone is awsmmm as always.Apple always up to the mark .I personally upgraded from I phone 6 and is quite amazing experience so far.

Upgrading from a 5s , this sure is a brilliant device. The camera is fantastic and the screen responds brilliantly to touch. The finish is top class and the colors stand out. Super phone by Apple , yet again

a good quality product from apple stable yet again. Post iphone 4, i have switched to many of high end phones in lumia and HTC range, just to return back to this iteration of iphone.
There isnt much gap between android and iphone functionalities now, but iphone is able to offer many usable tweaks within same functionalities, which may not be marketed but offer enough flexibility in everyday use.
On battery: It may seem like a Achilles heel. But for same functionality, where my 3000mah battery used to die in a day, this iphone is able to finish a day. I am no longer required to switch off 4g , or location to save battery. It is well taken care by the OS.

Review Title: Go for it if you can afford!!!!
Review Paragraph:
I have used almost all the iPhone models and love all of those. The recent iPhone 7 is worth a buy. Flipkart offer for iPhone 7 made me think of buying this.

Pros
1. Just the right size
2.The new connector for headphones is revolutionary, I tested the connector on one iPhone 5 and there is significant improvement over the normal 3.5 mm jack
3. The black colour is my favourite.
4. Photos and selfies better than iPhone 6.

Cons
No cons as such till now , will post if I find any.

--------------
Go for it if you can afford it, don't think of buying equally priced any other android phone. The iPhone will surely last for 3-4 years but other androids won't.

I am one of those who moved from 5S to 7 after long dreading not to go for a 4.7 inch screen and finally decided not to buy iPhone SE instead.
It's been almost 12 hours since unboxing the black beauty and the first impression is that this is FASSSSSSST! (S used 7 times) compared to my still surviving 5S.

Apart from speed you can look into Apple's approach towards future. This year they made the Home Button solid state, next year don't be surprised if the front of the phone is a giant glass and no home button.
They have already patented similar technology. You will get used to the new haptic feedback instead of "clicking"sound in a day.

Right now I am learning to effectively use 3D Touch.

Sound is indeed very high due to new stereo speakers. Even during calls I had to keep them at 1/3rd the full volume to get same sound as of 5S.

I can't comment on the experience that people will have moving from 6S to 7, but for everyone else this is THE BEST iPhone today especially when pre-order gave 10,000 off and Flipkart took my old iPhone 5S for 8900, so I got a brand new 7 for 60000-10000-8900=INR 41100 ( Additional 2x1000 Gift Card also provided by Flipkart making it 39100 for this order)
Couldn't have asked for anything more.

Camera of iPhone seems better than 6s version , it takes crisp photos.
No visible difference in speed .
New home button gives fake feeling of button :)
Other factors are good .

It's my second iPhone after iPhone 4.. so I am happy to see enhanced performance, new added features, better camera, bigger screen n so much to know in time to come. Thanks Flipkart for making it possible...

Finally I got this piece of marvel and such beauty after waiting for so long. Flipkart delivered it late, but the wait was worth every second of it. I just love it and getting it for 50k after that cash back thing makes it the best thing.

Have had my phone only for 6 hours and already can see the difference. It is snappy and light with a beautiful screen. The new button feedback takes some uses to get used to but once you get comfortable it works just fine. Thanks apple and Flipkart !

Thanks to flipkart. It was really grt feeling to have grt phone in hand. The iPhone 7 has awesome touch,battery back,design etc.and above all the camera quality is too good. Again my grt thanks to flipkart to deliver the phone on time.

Review Paragraph: Great phone. Loving the new features. Worth the wait and money. iPhone rocks! Wooooohoooooo!!! The care package of flip kart was amazing! Kept my phone safe during delivery. Took care like it was their own. Thank you, flipkart, for all the love you have bestowed on us!

To my joy they gifted me a 1000 INR voucher on my Flipkart wallet as a token of appreciation for my patience as the product was delayed, when the product finally arrived (neatly packed in the famous Flipkart This is ___ , you know what this is) I was mighty impressed that they left another 1000 voucher inside the cover.
I also got my old iphone 5 replaced for the best market price, and oh boy, its a joy to use the 7. Thank you Flippy...
Flipkart delivered the product before the promised time. Nice and special packaging for the phone. Great delivery time.

Quick & prompt delivery by Flipkart.
I have used every model of IPhone since 2008, so I don't need to review an IPhone. It is out of the world , no doubt about that.
Apple ditched the old 3.5 mm jack & instead placed a stereo speakers. This provides great immersive audio during gaming & entertainment.
It is a must upgrade from the iPhone 5s or 6 but if you are running a 6s then it is up to you .
If you want to trade in your audio jack for stereo speakers.
Anyways worth buying this phone !

So finally I received my product after a long wait. But the wait was worth. :-)

Packaging by Flipkart turned unboxing process into amazing experience .. The black box gave a special touch. :-D

Now coming to the phone. Touch is reallllllyyyy awesome and so is its camera & increased speed. New haptic touch doesn't let me feel that home button is not a button.

And new matte black colour gives it a classy look.

Heads up for the iPhone 7
Excellent phone, don't let the missing headphone jack dissuade you.
One of the best ever phone launched by apple. Amazing finish pretty impressive new features. I love my new I phone 7.

Review Title: Awesome Phone + Awesome Service from Flipkart!!!
Review Paragraph:
Awesome product and super awesome service by Flipkart!

The product was delivered before the promised date; in fact it was delivered on Oct 7 at 7pm which was the official launch date and time of iPhone 7. Liked their custom package for iPhone 7.

About the product... liked the camera, new stereo speakers and the performance. The iMessage feature in iOS 10 is just awesome.

Would highly recommend to buy this product from Flipkart!!

First of all the delivery of Flipkart via Ekart is pretty decent.! It showed me datte of delivery as 17 oct instead i got my product on 8 oct i.e. just after the release date in India.
I got Iphone 7 Black 128 version which looks pretty decent and is a fingerprint magnet too just like the jet black version..!!
The packaging was very much good, flipkart provided me the box inside their own box captioning as "This is ______, You know what it is! " slightly humourical but awesome black box! made me feel i bought a limited edition.!
As if I got htis phone just now can't say much about the product, but on my one day experience, the battery life is good, gave me 10 hrs of screen ontime on my wifi.!
Be careful with the sim ejecter, being a water resistent it need a hard press to open the sim tray.!

Flipkart should provide a screen protector along with a mandatory back cover to compliment the beast as i have to run to the store to buy what is available and gets fit on my phone to save it from any scratches.!

The camera was excellent, the low light performance is not good as s7 edge but did a decent job in pitch dark with quad flash, flont flash is also much brighter than 6s.

The most disappointing thing is the packaging of accesories.! Instead of a box case for earphones it comes in paper packaging rather than its previous versions which get a premius good looking plastic box.!

Overall the phone is worth its prize..!!!

At the end I welcome myself to Iphone7 league.!
Proud Iphone user.. Yipeeeeeee..!!! :)

For starters, Black is awesome ! The colour blends seamlessly with the screen and you end up with a great looking phone.

For someone like me, upgrading from iPhone 5, there is quite a bit of change. Fingerprint recognition, much better cameras (both front and back) and a significantly faster processor. If you are upgrading from the iPhone 6s, there's not much of a change, and you would rather wait for the next year's supposedly revolutionary iPhone 8.

No lag so far in opening the phone using fingerprint recognition, though it is quite early to tell if this will continue as the phone becomes older.

Phone feels a bit slippery in the hands, though a back cover sorts out this issue.

All in all, a great buy if you're on the older iPhone models. Can give this a skip if you are already on the iPhone 6s.

Review Title: Thank You Flipkart for the Great Delivery & Service
Review Paragraph:
Black looks awesome! But is is so slick. There are no lines and it looks like a solid 1 piece product. I saw the Glossy Jet Black and it is a work of art but it show fine scratches. So most people will use a case which hides the back anyway so maybe color is not that important. Mainly if you want a white front or black.

I love the new home button but it took about 10 minutes to get use to. I slightly miss the old home button.

Overall I love it! Fastest device that I have ever used & the camera quality is amazing!

128GB is perfect in size for most people. Hardcore photo and video people may want the 256GB model.

No headphone jack, doesn't bother me at all. The adapter sounds fine with my headphones. It's not really that large either. The lightning headphones sound really good to me.
Loving this product. This is the fastest mobile. Super smooth to use. Bette than my previous Android mobile. You've to use it to believe it. Camera is too good. Screen. Usage... Give it a try.

A nice upgrade from the previous iteration.
Very good service from Flipkart.

Pre-ordered the phone and received it on the release date.

Awesome product.

Thank you flipkart for making lightning fast delivery. Got this phone on 7th only.
Flipkart surprised me with the delivery on 7oct itself. What a beautiful way to present the way with chocolate and an amazing pack, you handled it so really well . Thanks and great job !!!!
On time delivery thanks to flipkart

Pre ordered the phone and got delivered on 7th itself I.e: one day earlier than promised that too on release date...

Packing was top notch...delivery was a sweet surprise with pictures and chocolates

It's a wonderful phone. I am an android user previously but the IOS made me fall in love with it the moment I got this phone. The flip kart service is amazing. They provided me the phone in 1 hr of the phone launch.

Amazing phone
The build is good and it actually feels royal to hold this phone in your hand.
The camera is better than iPhone 6s and the OIS really helps.
It has been working flawlessly.
Will update my review after a month.
Awesome phone. Got this on Flipkart on an amazing offer also. I got the 128 GB version at 52k with all the offers applied, can't believe it! And they delivered it a day before. Best thing I bought.

Review Title: Awesome!! The most awaited phone of the year
Review Paragraph:
One of the best iphone experience you will have after purchasing this model.
Plus an awesome deal from Flipkart, you will never get an iPhone at this price. Very smooth touch. Lucrative design.
Amazing live photo with a new camera. Longer battery life. Good quality earpods. Best gaming experience ever had on phone.
Looks same as iPhone 6/6s.. But functionality wise great product.. much faster than predecessors.. better graphics... much better camera.. Overall good deal..

Thank you Flipkart and WS Retail for making this happen on the launch date. Congratulations to Flipkart for making the Big Billion hassle free.

About the iPhone 7, it's an Awesome product. The new touch ID works so fast. The iphone7 in matte black looks so cool. Some of the best features I loved are,
1. Camera (Low light capability & OIS for rear. Thanks to wide angel lens for much better selfies)
2. Display (Much brighter than previous version)
3. Audio (Too good. Dual speakers are crisp and clear than ever)
4. Design (Looks alike iPhone 6, but the matte black looks much better in profile)
5. Battery (Even with 70% of battery, gave me a day of backup)

Overall the phone looks and feels good in hand and definitely a head Turner (atleast for few months).Performance wise its a killer. Only problem I faced is that the phone is a bit slippery due to its matte finish and thin profile. Better use a case if you think you might drop it (But as far as I think, case spoils the looks. It doesn't feels good than showing off your brand new iPhone 7)

Product of Apple is actually a brand hype. It is just that we wish to pay premium of more than 4 times the cost just for a name.

However I was amazed by the service of flipkart. They just did everything right this time. Kudos to the team.

Review Title: The phone was the best iPhone ever!! Seriously.
Review Paragraph: The phone is awesome. The black color looks very sexy and it feels good holding the phone. Its fast and it lives up to the A10 fusion chip. Definitely feels lighter in the hand (officially 5g lighter. Didn't really test the camera but it seems good. The black color is just too good and the phone looks complete uni-body because of the color.

A powerful device with a great camera. Photos look more natural and better. The black finish for me is simplest matching the shade I needed. Overall a great product and thanks Flipkart for delivering it so fast!

All in all Thank you Flipkart.

A brilliantly built phone. The screen is identifiably more vivid and represents colours more naturally. The A10 chip makes life easier with super fast processing speeds.

iPhone is an iPhone, way above all phones. iPhone 7 is sleek, light, fast and AWESOME. Go for it.

Like I am a loyal iPhone user since 2008 and have used all the upgrades since iPhone4s till iPhone 7 now. This phone continues to mesmerise me since then. A total package for people who love to play games on their phones without any issues relating to hanging of phone or battery issues. The version 7 has improved in terms of camera quality , the camera is much better in night mode with better exposure and brightness as compared to iPhone 6s. The removal of jack does not create any problem as the lightening connector continues to make life simpler here. The black Color of the phone has changed from dark black to matte black with a super sexy look and moreover the risk of stratches on the back is totally nullified. The phone is slimmer and lighter now. Overall with the cash back and the exchange offer on flipkart the iphone 7 is totally a win win case. So happy to own one. !

Review Title: Amazing to say the least, happy to have got it
Review Paragraph:

Upgrading from the iPhone 5s to this has a remarkable difference although the iPhone 6s is similar in usage and speed. The stereo speakers (hearing piece and speaker) is LOUDest I've had on the the iPhones I've used, hope that capable and wakes me up in the mornings. All in all a great device, you can never go wrong.
Excellent delivery time was simple and was also greeted with chocolates and a lovely voucher from Flipkart. Not to miss the box that it came in with a little teaser. Made my evening and my weekend :)

My is an upgrade from 5s to 7, home button is tricky it will take some time to get used to it. After using 5.5 inch oneplus3 this phone feels little small but I was looking for a small factor phone. Hope for the best ....

Review Title: Thanks Flipkart executives for the timely delivery
Review Paragraph:
First of all, Hats off to Flipkart for the super fast delivery.
I had the phone with me before 10pm just 3 hours after the official launch.
Availed 10k cashback offer from Citibank.

Now coming to the phone. It is worth buying or upgrading if you have iPhone 6 or older model.
The Stereo speakers are great. Taptic feedback of home button feels a bit strange so it might take some time to get used to it. There is noticeable difference in camera compared to iPhone 6, however i found it to be a bit yellowish.
Phone is pretty swift and there is hardly any lag in opening media intensive apps.

Shifting from 3.5mm jack to lighting is a big step and it definitely hurts people like me who own expensive 3.5mm earphones.

Looks wise the Black looks stunning. Iphone 6 and 6s covers do not fit the 7, mainly due to differently placed camera, no headphone jack and long microphone grill.

To sum up, the phone if great and worth an upgrade or switchover from android.

As I do not use it for any other purposes! - For that I have ANDROID!

iPhone 7 was launched at 7 PM IST on October 7 in India. I received an SMS at 7 PM that the delivery boy is out and I will be getting the product. I received my product at 8 PM, within one hour of the launch. With great excitement I open the packing that said priority. Upon opening I found a flipkart exclusive black box designed for iPhone 7. This packing is elegant and a surprise. Kudos to flipkart for the packing and delivery.

Coming to the phone:
1) The colour is elegant. Even though the design is nearly the same except for the 3.5mm earphones jack, the colour is something which makes it different and gorgeous. The touch is awesome and the phone setup is easy.
2) The speakers are louder than the previous versions of the phone. But I am not sure if it is 2 times the sound of previous phones.
3) 4G reception is good. I tried Airtel 4G and Reliance Jio.
4) The camera is good.
5) I absolutely love the customisable home button which gives me feeling that I am pressing a button which is against the feeling of using most android phones.
6) More storage is a delight.

Cons:
1) The battery backup is not great. It is draining quite fast even at minimal YouTube and internet usage with no new apps installed and running in the background.
2) The display satisfies my eyes but it could have been better when it comes to resolution. But I love what I am seeing.

The phone is gorgeously simple. Thanks to flipkart and Apple.

The iPhone 7 was a great phone when it first came out, but it's now pushing two years old. The main reason why you would want to invest in an iPhone 7 is that the iPhone X is too expensive and iPhone 8 only has a very insignificant spec bump. Lets recap some of the features that you would get which dont exist in the previous generations of iPhones:

1. Storage - Apple increased the base storage from 16 gigabyte to 32 gigabyte. If you are looking to buy the base variant, you wont feel a dearth of storage.
2. Design - The iPhone 7 comes in all new jet black finish which is extremely premium. Apart from this, the matte black variant is also very sleek.
3. New Home Button - The new home button is a capacitive touch based taptic feedback button which responds to pressure sensitivity. It makes the button feel more tactile and is a great everyday experience.
4. Water resistance - The iPhone 7 is now IP67 rated and is resistant to dust and water as per the rating standards.
5. Display - Apple claims that the iPhone 7 display now has a wider color gamut as compared to the previous generations which allows it to reproduce brighter, more intense shades of colour. And as an extra bonus, its panel is now a claimed 25% brighter than the display on the iPhone 6S.

PS: The current listed price on flipkart is 49,000 INR which is a little on the higher side, but moreover since the price between iPhone 7 & 8 is about 15,000 INR it is wise to invest in iPhone 7 than 8.

Review Title: Great for power users, fantastic offers from flipkart
Review Paragraph: The iPhone is great for power users who like to just carry one device for everything: sending emails, clicking pictures, listening to music, and obviously making calls. Yes, I miss the headphone jack, but I'm sure I'll get used to carrying the adapter everywhere. The live photos are cool. The service from Flipkart is fabulous. The app was easy to use, I booked and paid for the phone in under 3 minutes. I was told that the phone will be delivered by October 17th due to heavy orders, however it was delivered today (October 09). Thanks for the BBD offers as well Flipkart.

It's been 6 hours since I've been using this phone. Perfect beauty....no lag camera is awesome. Every penny spent on this phone is worth it. Only problem that I am facing is with ringtone. My phone is only vibrating while an incoming call. As I am able to play song so it means speaker is fine. I will figure it out. One star deducted is for that only. Hope the problem will get resolved. Last but not the least flipkart is good as usual. Delivered next day of placing my order. Hope the phone is genuine:-) Overall I am really happy with my phone. The new iPhone 7. Will post again after using it for some time.

Review Title: Don't buy high end products rather go Apple Store
Review Paragraph: My opinion is to buy this type of costly products from the Apple Store only, because the product which I received was a opened sealed box, then Flipkart replaced it and now I am having a brand new product, but this is not at all expected when you are buying such costly products, I had to be without any smartphone for 8 days, so please go for Apple Store rather than buying used products.

I bought this iPhone from Flipkart on 22nd September 2017. After 3 months of usage, the phone switched off automatically. i took the phone to apple service center in Moradabad. The service center refused to give the warranty and said the phone is already opened from the seller.
The APPLE SERVICE CENTER said that THE iPHONE HAD OLDER PARTS IN THE DEVICE.

I raised the query to Flipkart on 18th january 2018. They asked for JOB SHEET from Service center with writing that Flipkart gave the malfunctioned device. I then talked to Apple support number and they refused to write any such thing. Rather they write that the phone is opened and didn't mention Flipkart.
later i sent the JOB SHEET to flipkart and they said they will get back to me within 7 days.
I didn't hear anything from them in 7 days. so i called them after 7 days, they apologized for the inconvenience caused and promised to get back to me in 7 days. Till that day to now. They haven't get back to me. I call them and they apologize and give the date but don't take any actions.

Today on 9th March 2018. Exactly after 50 days of my first communication i am writing this to help you all guys to not fall in the trap of discounted product as i am myself a victim of such traps. Flipkart doesn't give us new phones. It rather gave us the refurbished devices with repaired internal parts.

My iPhone 7 is still with the SERVICE CENTER and is DEAD.
The Warranty is Declined by APPLE.
FLIPKART is not doing anything.
I paid 39000 for this iPhone and used it only for 3 MONTHS.
Now i am just roaming from FLIPKART to APPLE and vice versa.

You see THIS IS A CYCLE. They are just doing this so that i should i give up on there services.
I call them every 3rd or 4th day. i talk to them for about 1 hour everyday
Sick of a service
I know this review will be deleted by flipkart.
this is all a scam of selling phones at discount by putting the repaired parts in them.

MEANWHILE I GOT TO KNOW THAT 90% of the phones from FLIPKART doesn't get the WARRANTY

NO SERVICE. NO WARRANTY.

FEELING CHEATED

I got my phone delivered from supercomnet in 4 days from Bangalore and just loving my phone. I had a 6s and upgraded to 7 and notice considerable upgrades.

1. It has a taptic engine based soft home button so the feedback response is quick and I am happy to get off the 3.5 mm audio jack to fit in this engine.

2. Its much faster and night photography is much cleared and crisper, thanks to the 1.8f rear camera which is an upgrade from the 2.2f camera in 6s.

3. The audio driver is much better and as such the audio quality is much clearer from 6s.

4. It has dual speakers at top and bottom and the sound output is much louder and better than 6s.

5. Already a big fan of the jet black color i got.

6. The 3D touch screen is much more responsive than 6s.

Battery back up has improved over 6s by an hr and a half approx.

Over all i love this new monster and specs might undermine the power of this product but the iOS 10 is designed to give optimum and faster performance with the specs built in. So to me a 2gb ram on iPhone 7 turned out faster than the 4 gb Ram in some chinese android phones like lenovo because of optimisation.

Similarly the 12 mp 1.8f camera is much responsive than the so called 20mp moon light camera in some phones.

I would recommend not to go only for the hardware but for the over all responsiveness of the phone.

1. About camera - very poor camera when compared to mobiles same range of phone. Photos taken indoor are totally noisy no clarity.
2. If glass or display is damaged be ready to shell out another Rs 22 K for repair if you don't have insurance which cost another Rs 5K.
3. Earphone's jack and charging jack is same. So if you lose your your earphone. Be ready to shell out Rs 2.5 K as no other earphones will work in this phone.
4. Not fully water resistant. If by any chance or mistake your phone is drowned in water then your speaker quality is gone.
Really, got a nice deal!

Review Title: Battery is a nightmare for iphone 7
Review Paragraph:
Battery is worst.. within 6-8 hours it becomes 10-20% from fully charged with an average usage (under wifi usage with regular internet surfing without any video call and video streaming)
Second one is heating issue while using facebook app for more than 20mint and during video calls.
These two major issues can hide all of its beauty.

Review Title: Misleading ads, All hype not worth it
Review Paragraph:
Have seen ads about iphone7 coming with wireless earphones. "What are earpods" I'm not a tech savvy person, when I saw earpods in product description I thought earpods are cordless earphones. When I received the delivery to my surprise there are normal earphones, moreover the earphones do not connect to phone directly it requires another connecting cord. Now we have to carry this additional dingy cable all along with it. Also, the packaging of the accessories is lousy - didn't expect this from apple for a product at such a price tag.

It seems there is a problem with sound volume also not certain yet.

All hype not worth it. Think once again before buying iphone6 could be better value for the price.

Apple - I Phone-7 is one of the best phone which is fulfilling all my needs on day to basis office use as well as Personal use.

I ordered the product on 4th Oct 2016 as part of the preorder scheme with the promised delivery date of 14th Oct 2016.

Since there was no update from Flipkart regarding shipping of product, I called in the Customer support line to check on the status of the product. I was assured that the delivery time lines would be adhered. On 14th Oct i received an update from Flipkart with the delivery date pushed to 10th Dec 2016. Contacted customer care again to get in touch with the senior most escalation manger. It appears they are available only 9am-9pm.(Not sure why the banner says 24x7 Customer Care) Though they didn't bother to attend me even during their work timings. Without even hearing me out and providing an update on the order, the other representative's keep on saying i have provided all the information and even disconnected calls. The case was closed without any update.

With all the lying and shenanigans the product was delivered to me on 18th Oct.

P.S: Flipkart offered me 1000 Rs to accept delayed delivery rather than sticking to their commitments. In case wondering, this review isn't from my new phone so you can keep the other 1000 Rs as well.

Please do not buy an iphone online. I bought iphone7 32gb from flipkart which started having problems within the first week itself. I thought it is a network issue but later realized that the hardware has a problem. The receiver of the phone gets blocked real bad in 1-2 calls out of 12-15 calls. My ear has started to pain and it seems that the phone will explode. Apple provides only telephone support which does no good to the hardware. I followed all the instructions they provided but still I had to send my phone to Patna(nearest service center) which is 250kms from my place one side. And the person there tells that he cannot repair it until i showed him the problem (which is acceptable) but the problem happens with 1-2 calls out of 12-15, which i wasn't able to prove. Not practical for anyone to stay there the entire day to show the blocking problem. Now have to travel back again 250kms(500kms one trip) and god knows if my phone will have a problem again then i'll have to come back again for the same problem. Facing the problem of not being able to prove myself right again. Makes me feel that i've made a fool out of myself on buying iphone.

After spending so much on a phone and still getting a very bad service from apple makes me write this review. Please think about the service before you buy. I do not recommend it buying here if you value your money (45k something). Better to spend a few grands more in the apple store.

Apple haters can say anything, well they say only 2 things, customisation and price, I am not a typical customisation guy, for me things have to work out of box as expected and it should be updated always. Data security is most important. After seeing lots of YouTube reviews I bought Samsung Galaxy S7, For one week it was cool, After that it starts to feel like another android device, Latest features only on paper no refinements, Bad UI, For any consumer device design and usability matters, well felt like it not refined just like skin over android, a lot of background services. Bad camera - in low light and back object appear below average. You can't download or update apps on roaming cellular network. I thought to exchange it with iPhone no luck on Flipkart there is not S7 option on SAMSUNG category, Outside no value for secondhand android device so I gave device brother and Bought iPhone 7. I am using a Mac as my system both work together great. As always fell grate on hands, Awesome UI, much refined apps, Better image rendering, Best security integration with apps, message grate, 1.5 days of battery backup on medium internet usage, Automatic back of all call history from old to new apple device, free apple apps as Garageband, move, 4K video shooting and more on I am loving it

This is a phone for serious people & not for those who would always be happy fiddling with cheap apps, playing with funny themes, fonts, transferring media every hour & so on.. iOS is just not interested in cheap funny fonts & themes..!! Review Title: Upgraded from the iPhone 6 to iphone 7
Review Paragraph:
Firstly flipkart did a good job on delivering the phone on next day. Overall iPhone 7 is a nice upgrade from iPhone 6 as I got 3D touch, Live photos, better camera, aA10 processor, Stereo speakers and it's water proof.
Working very fast, good battery life, excellent touch experience on taptic engine.

It was delivered and the exchanges of old phone also handled very smoothly. I would rate the overall experience as excellent. The product also rated excellent.

I ordered the phone on 19th December and got the delivery on 22nd December in the afternoon itself i.e. 2 days before expected delivery. The packing was good and the product is also proper condition. I found the related accesories as mentioned in the specifications.

About the phone:
Jet Black colour is awesome but the Apple Logo is not properly visible due to this colour. The back side of the phone is scratch prone so you better a back cover also at the same time. Camera is as usual awesome. Phone is handy and less weighted. Being an Android user I am finding it little bit difficult to use apple but I am learning it slowly.
Overall I just have to say that... "An Iphone is an Iphone" :)
Excellent

Review Title: Scratches over front of the phone.
Review Paragraph: there are scratches on the front side of the phone, The scratches are in the form of small silver lines on the periphery of the phone that one could not identify it, when you tilt the phone you get to see it. I am fortunate enough that I saw it. I am really very disappointment with the flipkart services. You guys claim to be the official partner of the Apple iPhone 7 and does this. First, the phone was to be delivered in 1 day and then next day I got to know my package had gone to the delivery boy of the other area and that meant I will not get it that day. And next day when I again received the message that the phone will be delivered, the message did not had the contact number of the delivery, I mean that's awesome, a person investing 60k on a phone at your site is one of the most stupid person in the world. He has no right to track his order over phone. And to top it all, the very intelligent delivery boy dint even bother to ca;; the customer to receive the IPHONE7, he just handed it over to watchman and went. What the hell, am I buying a rubber band from you portal that he wont bother to call the customer, why are you guys ask for our phone numbers then. I have requested for a replacement now and I hope if you guys have some sort of respect left, you will do it at the earliest.

Review Title: Worth to buy iPhone7. Best phone in the world.
Review Paragraph:
The people who are not buying iPhone are giving negative reviews.

Why you should buy iPhone7?
1-Best phone camera in world. Big lens, better optics, OPTICAL IMAGE STABILISATION.
2-Four LED flash.
3-Increased finger print sensor accuracy.
4-Taptic engine
5-Stereo speakers
6-Improved touch ID
7-Improved 3D touch and screen quality.
8-iOS 10
9-Water resistance

The only negative point is absence of headphone jack and price.

Ordered on Flipkart.Given that I had a HDFC card would have preferred Amazon.But they were out of stock at 7.30 am on day 1. Did they have any stock in central Bangalore?
The buying process with Flipkart was very smooth. I was prepared for delivery on 8th but got a message saying it will be delivered on 7th evening itself.
Thought we could get a rare delivery from Bansal as their office is nearby. But just as we hit the bed, the Flipkart person called. He would be delivering in 5 minutes. We had a quick exchange based on IMEI and he was good to go. He also seemed to know the whole excitement of a new iPhone release and seemed to be quite happy to participate.
It is a little early to write about the device. It is light and shiny enough to be considered bling! iOS has to be updated. Contacts transfer was automatic.
Predictive typing is there. Unlike Swiftkey this seems to have a better preset library.
All in all an Apple phone with the best of the Android world. At Apple prices though!
While the media criticises Apple for similar devices, fact is that Apple continues to deliver excellent devices.
This is a 24 hour review where the biggest observation is that Flipkart is regaining its customer focus. Give a month for a phone review!

Well this what the iPhone 6 should been but alas it was not.... Finally Apple brings us the iPhone 7 and really there nothing much to say about it since it's been real smooth and shall be for multiple years, and that's perhaps the most critical reason of people buying iphones at even this ridiculous price.
Special mention to Flipkart.com they really outdid themselves on this one since the official release of the iPhone pan India was on the 7th Oct 7pm I was amazed to receive it at my doorstep at 9pm which is just astonishing, I was earlier regretting that I bought the phone online since I needed it on launch date but surprise surprise flipkart stumped me..... 10/10 for flipkart delivery team.

Review Title: A preorder which never felt so great!
Review Paragraph:
Amazing delivery service by Flipkart! Flipkart actually made preorder feel more special, kudos to team. Now coming to product, good as expected but is not a major upgrade over iPhone 6s with only major difference of home button. I will post again detailed review after a week's use.
Still thanks to flipkart for making preorder special and seamless delivery that too at 8 just an hour after launch of product.
Excellent product

Pros
1) elegant design
2) rose gold is simply superb
3) stereo speakers--i must say it's the loudest iPhone i ever used
4)call quality 10/10
5) Signal reception excellent
6) Battery life needs to be tested. Because its only few hours since i am using it. But battery drain is too slow. So i am sure battery life will also be very good.
7)Performance wise it's a beast. very much impressed
8) Memory starts now at 32gb!!! Sigh of relief
9)water proofing---dint test it
10) Camera 9/10 --- s7 and Google pixel has better camera. Will test it soon.

Cons
1) i miss home button. because the fingerprint sensor is embedded in the display and won't get a natural feeling of using home button
2) lack of audio jack.

Lastly i want to thank flipkart for delivering the phone on 7th October 2016. Thanks a lot. Overall very happy with iPhone 7.

Review Title: Met expectation for what I expected and hoped for!
Review Paragraph:
Its close to a month now using 7. I am not here to describe pros and cons of 7 as you can find 100's of YouTube videos related to this topic.
I will here share my experience of 7 through Flipkart.
So here I go,
In the first place itself, I really don't trust online shopkeepers generally like you all I guess so and for this much rate bar certainly not. Few months back I was planning to buy Air and was getting really good deals out here from these online sellers but somehow I still went inperson to one of my nearest Apple store and purchased the product through Apple directly.
Talking about 7, I really couldn't resist myself to book this product with the deal I was getting at that time on Flipkart. But I was prepared to take risk and for getting a wrong or fake product delivered if I am not lucky enough.
Now here, Flipkart proved me wrong. I got a genuine 7 with mentioned delivery time and prodigious service.
I will rate 5 star for this particular experience I had with Flipkart.
I am not saying you can't get cheated or can get wrong product delivered mistakenly but what I am saying is that you can still bet on Flipkart.
JFYI, Flipkart and Infibeam are the only 2 authorised Apple iPhone sellers in India (again, its not like others are selling fake products but these are the only two's in which no third parties are involved). This is what Apple customer care says.
Please be my guest if something new you would like to add.
I really hope this helps you in choosing a right item in a right way!

Review Title: Phone is good but charged extra amount by the seller
Review Paragraph:
The Phone is very good. But flipkart is making fool to me. I have purchased this product on 27 Feb 2018 at 01:37 P.M with extra save on SBI card EMI transaction of INR 2461 and total amount shows as INR 41538. I haven't received the discounted amount of INR 2461 and I have to pay EMI of INR 4889 for 9 months exclusive tax of INR 87.32. But as per the discount I have to pay the EMI of INR 4615.

After all discount they shows INR 41538 in my bill also but they charged total INR 44787.42 which means total loss of INR 3249.42.

I highly recommending not to buy from flipkart and their seller SuperComNet. If you buy the same from outside you will get the same with all discount in just INR 42000.

They show something and charged something. I really feed up and I'll really want to make this complaint to consumer court.

If you also want to help me then please stop purchase from Flipkart.

I would like to share my entire buying experience with Flipkart. Apple products are known for its quality and overall user experience. However if you buy any apple product apart from Apple reseller or store then you would not entitled for warranty.
I was surprised when I got to know that even buying from Amazon doesnt come under warranty ambit of Apple here in India.
Only flipkart and Infibeam are the online reseller partners in India, which can be verified from Apple site.
So it is important that you buy product only from the places which are registered unde Apple and you can eligible to claim warranty in case of any issues with the product. I purchased from Flipkart because of iphone 7 low costing as compared to Apple reseller shops at Bangalore.

Product delivered on time, however it is important that you dont open up a product as soon as you receive it. It is better to check warranty coverage and get assured that it is genuine product. Additionally you can call Apple customer care and get it verified, they are the most amazing customer service team on the planet.

Outer box was damaged when i received the product and I was disappointed with Flipkart seller SupercomNet, I have notified Flipkart customer care about the issue. But they assured me that in case of any issues in the actual product they would initiate the return. With trust I opened up a box and happy and relieved to see that everything was in place including accessories and leaflets. But next day, phone screen started flickering and it was hanged until i forcefully restarted. I was panicked with entire episode and decided to initiate return and called flipkart CS team. CS team had asked to go to Apple for issues and i was frustrated with their solution. 10 days return policy is just luring customers to grab the order, rest i assure you that it is not easy to get your product returned. I fought with them, I had proofs of emails and images of damaged box which had strengthened my case and finally after 1 hr of call they had agreed for the replacement. Received the new product next day, I have started using it and hoping that there wont be any issues.

Cutting long story short, you can definitely buy Apple product from Flipkart however that should not be your first option. I guess for savings of couple of thousands there wont be any point of buying an expensive product from eCom sites . I am using Flipkart since last 5 yrs and It is saddening to see the deterioration in their buying and customer experience overall. I hope that Flipkart would tackle such issues more professionally in future, nobody wants to RETURN their product if there are no issues FLIPKART.
Thanks

This would have been completely avoided if I purchased the phone from a physical store since I would have checked it for these starting issues. You can too save yourself a lot of pain if you check your device physically before the purchase. I know some of you may be thinking that it's normal and apple only should be handling such an issue. But the Flipkart purchase page says in bold : 10 days replacement. But no one tells the hidden clauses behind your purchase. So if you want to save yourself from some pain and embarrassment... I've had the worst of experience shopping with flipkart when I ordered for iPhone 7 on 5th of October(order id:OD507249672900837000) which was promised to be delivered by 14th of October. Till 14th I didn't get any update whether the phone is dispatched or not. I made a call at the helpline number to confirm whether I will get the phone delivered on 14th or not. The executive promised me that your will get the phone on 14th itself. Unfortunately the phone was not delivered on 14th. Later on 16th October I received a message and email saying there will be a delay in the delivery for the same product. Eventually I received the product on 21st October which was very disappointing as I sold my smartphone considering I will get it delivered on 14th October.
Another worst experience I had was that I found a pamphlet in the delivery mentioning you will get ₹1000 gift voucher if you will download the flipkart application on your iOS. I followed the procedure but nothing happened. Later I called at the service centre regarding the same issue where I was being told that you will have to write a review from from you application only you downloaded on your iOS. I tried posting the review but there was no write a review option available on flipkart app. I again called to customer care number for help where they told me to wait for us to come back till 24th October. I waited till 27th of october when I got a call from one of your executives saying we are sorry there's no write a review option available on iOS app which was hell disappointing! The executive then asked me to write a review from desktop which I'm doing now just for ₹1000 GV! Highly unprofessional you guys are!

Update: After following the sheep race of having Brand (Oh sorry the Logo)

Probably the worst Hyped Phone Brand.
Cons-
1.) You cant connect to your Pc/Laptop and view its content (any file) directly you require Itunes which requires sync all the time - Even for adding one song it will sync the entire library to sync, absolutely rubbish, technology should be friendly not time consuming.

2) Even if you transfer photos from Pc/Laptop to iphone it cant be deleted through your phone, it needs to be deleted from your pc and then synced (Just think about the stupidity-belive it or not try it yourself). Phone storage becomes an issue. You even cant think of transferring through 2 itunes eg: in work area you have laptop and home is another- it wont sync , it will only accpet one itunes - for the other one you need to replace the data & sync again. (Dumbness)

3) Battery - Should be given negative, it says its optimized but again personal Experience - if you are just reading or viewing daily news content for just 10-15mins by that itself you will loose power, it will indicate it 100% & as it goes idle it will show 20% decrease ( Thinking i have a faulty device - Try, buy then understand and regret it).
Its value for money. Battery could have better thats the only thing i felt. Over all if you looking for IPhone this one better. In diwali sale i got it for 37k.

GOOD:
+ water resistant - this is a huge improvement for me!
+increased speed is noticeable w Siri.
+the capacity is amazing! I can keep movies, videos, books, photos, music etc without having to store on iCloud or the like (which usually involves a monthly fee).
+ decent size (same as iPhone 6S) while remaining portable and although not as big as the 7 Plus, it can still fit in pocket.
+Widget feature (swiping to right at home screen) has been improved and now allows editing. You can add or delete features which can be key for privacy and being able to customize is always a good thing.
+has lots of added fun features in iMessage (not sure if its the updated software or strictly iPhone 7) like memes, automatic replies and being able to write w your fingertip.
+camera takes much better pics (increased the megapixels and the difference is noticeable) and it has 5X zoom capability.
+has the fingerprint option for quicker access after you enter your 6 digit pass code to begin.
+even slimmer than the iPhone 6 but still able to stand up against something for convenient viewing.
+speaker upgrade as it now provides stereo (not up to audiophile standards but still).

BAD:
- no headphone jack!! but box includes dongle (see photo) which inserts into charging port and provides headphone jack - I have a bet with myself on how long it will take to lose. I know wireless headphones are the future but happy with my old faithful headphones.
-the home button is not as well defined. Its gonna take longer than 24 hrs to get used to as it takes me a few tries to activate the home button. It requires the right amount of pressure and despite offering three different options, not easy. The guys at the Apple Store need to stop showing off - on the bright side, I'm thinking it's a learning curve thing and continued use should take care of this issue.

Review Title: Superb device delivered on launch day itself!
Review Paragraph:

Superb piece of device as always from Apple! Superb packing and delivery by flipkart! Using it for few hours now and completely happy! Will update the review later in more detail!

Dam good delivery,thanks to Flipkart for fastest delivery.

Got my new iPhone 7 yesterday evening. Needless to say I have spent quite a few hours since then & loving the experience. It's the last mile of user experience where none dares to enter, Apple hits it for a sixer. I still remember the wow experience I had when I got my iPhone 3 back in 2009 after using a HTC windows smart phone for couple of years, it's the similar experience now after I moved to iPhone 7 after using Nexus 4 for last three years. It was cool to see the finger print based authentication, crisp videos, and markedly better pic quality. Looking forward to use time lapse and slo-mo features. Thanks flipkart for delivering it on the very first day of it's launch in India. As usual, you stand out when it comes to customer service.

Review Title: Pre-Order on Flipkart and the product - 5 stars
Review Paragraph:
First of all great job by Flipkart , delivering the product on 7th night itself. You have redefined the term online shopping made easy. As for the phone , it feels great in the hand and is not as slippery as the matte versions.
Yes a cover might be required in the long run but till then the phone is durable enough that all finger prints can be wiped clean.
Overall Awesome experience.

Excellent service from flipkart
Got the delivery on launch day itself. Thanks Flipkart for your fast delivery. Phone is just awesome. Best iPhone by Apple till day.

Last year Flipkart had lost me as a customer. I cringed at the idea of buying the iPhone from flipkart but I didn't have a choice as they had the best offers.

I had really Low expectations. I thought the phone will not even come on time.
As usual I get a call from the delivery agent saying I have incorrectly entered the wrong pin and will not get the delivery on time. I thought these guys have completely lost the plot. On checking my invoice, I learnt I indeed had made the mistake of entering the wrong address. The flipkart team said they will try to deliver it later at night.

To my pleasant surprise, the delivery guys went out of their way to get my phone right on time!! Not only that two delivery executives Kamlesh and Vinayak greeted me as if it was a special day for me. I was really surprised that the iPhone was packed in a special box along with a small treat.

It reflects how hard flipkart is working to go the extra mile and I am amazed at their service.
The first thing I did was download the flipkart app and write this review!

You have won me back as a customer!

Thanks for making my purchase so special!
